item.description:
Come join us for a tour of the Haunted Victorian Mansion in Gardner, Mass.
This house has been written about in the book "Haunted New England" and has been featured on
"Ghost Hunters" and more recently, other paranormal shows, as well as investigated by many famous paranormal teams.

The tour will begin in the front parlor at 7:00 pm, where you can read about the history of the house, and hear an introduction and description of the ghostly activity and sitings in the house. Then Edwin the owner, will take us on a tour throughout the entire house, from the basement to the widow's walk, discussing the paranormal activity that has happened in each room.
The tour is $10.00 per person.

The tour is about an hour and a half, and then for those who wish to join us, we will be going
to Southside Grill for supper and/or drinks directly after the tour at 8:00 pm- Restaurant is 5 mins down the road......

Please RSVP if you will be joining us , so I can make reservations.

Website for Southside Grill is at:

http://www.southsidem...


Check out the Haunted Victorian's website below:


http://hauntedvictori...

Cameras and Videos are welcome :)

Also, please note, there is a strict limit of 20 people for this meet up- if there is enough people on the waiting list, there will be another tour scheduled for the following week on Fri, Feb 25th

Also, the snow date is Friday, Feb 25th-
Please watch the email list for cancellations!!!
item.name: Haunted Victorian Ghost Tour
